actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day on December 14, 2023.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
This resolution supports the annual recognition of Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day on December 14, 2023.

In addition, the resolution commends (1) interscholastic athletic administrators for their commitment to secondary school student athletes; and (2) the National Interscholastic Athletic Administrators Association for providing continuous learning, professional development, and resources to assist those within the profession.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day on December 14, 2023.
